news.title: Why Lucid Stock Is Sinking Today
news.content: Lucid ( NASDAQ: LCID ) stock is losing ground in Wednesday's trading. The company's share price was down 6% as of 2:30 p.m. ET and had been down as much as 10.2% earlier in the day's trading.Lucid stock is falling due to catalysts related to the results of the U.S. presidential election.

news.content: With Donald Trump clinching a second term in the 2024 U.S. presidential election, markets are turning their attention to his potential impact on the economy and markets.

news.title: Robinhood Reports Record Overnight Trading Volume, 400 Million 2024 Election Contracts Traded - Robinhood Markets  ( NASDAQ:HOOD )
news.content: Stocks and cryptocurrencies saw heavy action during the after-hours trading session during the 2024 election thanks to the expansion of 24-hour trading at companies like Robinhood Markets HOOD, which sees the extended hours as a key user growth item moving forward.
